page.title: 13Employment in Bletchley
page.content: A lot of people live in Bletchley and most of them work in the town.A lot of the others work in nearby Milton Keynes.Some people have to travel to work by train because their jobs are in London. Most people travel to work by car, and it usually takes them approximately ten minutes or less. Other people travel to work by bus or bike,or if they have not got any of these they walk. On average,two people from each household go to work.Many people have had more than one job since they have been living in Bletchley.Nearly everyone said they enjoyed doing the work they do. All in all,I think that Bletchley, with its fun and excitement,its people and their work,is a safe and secure and a good place to live.
